meanings.definition: A muscle of the neck and back that extends and rotates the head.
meanings.sent1: The splenius muscle helps us turn our heads.
meanings.sent2: I felt a twinge in my splenius after looking over my shoulder.
meanings.sent3: The splenius muscle must be the boss of head movements!
meanings.sent4: Her splenius muscle was as strong as a steel cable, effortlessly moving her head.
meanings.sent5: I imagined my splenius muscle as a gentle giant, guiding my head movements.

meanings.sent1: The splenius stretch felt soothing after a long day.
meanings.sent2: She had a splenius massage to relieve tension in her neck.
meanings.sent3: Wearing the splenius brace made him feel like a superhero!
meanings.sent4: The splenius exercises made her feel more connected to her body.
meanings.sent5: The splenius relaxation techniques helped him unwind after work.
